title: Similar to Corpid?
content:
Can anyone help me identify this typeface?

It is similar to Corpid. I’m sure I recognise it from somewhere but I can’t seem to find it anywhere.

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803054039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/weightmans_4739.jpg)
author: chrisbolton

comments.content: Same designer Lucas de Groot but [TheMix](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803054039/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/themix).
